question: I was just wondering if any of you ladies have ever had preeclampsia and what it felt like.  I dont know if this is what is going on with me or not but I was having bad pain in my ankle for a few weeks, now my ankle and knee hurt so bad I can barley walk.   Also my toes and fingers are gettng slightly painful and very stiff feeling.  But all of this is only on my left side of my body.  Anyone have a similar experiance?  I have a doctors appt. in the morning.
title: Has anyone here ever had preclampsia?
